ComicInfo.Title: Part 3
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sara's baby is born. This issue marks the end and beginning of things...
Overview
First Born culminates as the battle between the forces of Light and Dark reaches a fever pitch. And in the final issue of this summer's hottest event – the birth of Sara Pezzini's child!
Writer Ron Marz (Ion, Samurai: Heaven & Earth) and digital painter Stjepan Sejic (The Darkness: Level 1, Witchblade) deliver the ultimate conclusion and set up events for the next thrilling year to come including The Darkness ongoing series.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-23 22:38:32. [CVDB118024]
ComicInfo.Characters: Celestine Wright, Danielle Baptiste, Detective Gleason, Hope Pezzini, Jackie Estacado, Magdalena, Sara Pezzini, Witchblade
